name: Theme Inspector
tagline: Quickly inspect your WordPress templates and learn the template hierarchy
body:
# Theme Inspector Plugin for WordPress

## Description:  
Ever spent too much time trying to figure out _which template loads when_ on your WordPress site?
Theme Inspector displays useful information on pages and posts to aid in developing Wordpress themes. Theme Inspector tells you exactly what conditional tags are true, and what files load on each page view. 

* Use In Conjunction with the [WP Template Hierarchy Document](http://wp.tutsplus.com/articles/wordpress-cheat-sheets-template-heirarchy-map/).
* Install in the wp-content/plugins directory
* Theme Inspector is only visible to logged in users.

## Author: 
[Melissa Cabral](http://melissacabral.com/)

## Plugin URI: 
[Download Theme Inspector](https://github.com/melissacabral/theme_inspector
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
